sources.title: "Human Hearts" (1922)
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems     This is a short preview. You can watch the whole film here: https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/index.php/gems-for-donation   "Human Hearts" is a crime drama included in our program to illustrate the work and contributions of Snitz Edwards, a star of Silent Hall of Fame. The peaceful life of a rural family is shattered when one of its members is murdered. Directed by                     King Baggot Produced by                   Universal Film Manufacturing Company Scenario                          Lucien Hubbard and Marc Robbins Based on                         the play Human Hearts by Hal Reid Starring                          House Peters, Russell Simpson, Gertrude Claire, Edith Hallor, Mary Philbin, Snitz Edwards Cinematography            Victor Milner and Otto Dyar Distributed by                Universal Film Manufacturing Company Release date                    August 1922 Running time                  97 minutes Country                           United States Language                         Silent film, English intertitles   Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the Copyright Act 1976: "Allowance is made for "fair use" for purposes such as criticism, comment, news reporting, teaching, scholarship, and research.
